title: Keeping your teeth healthy
creator_credit: Suzanne Johnston, Hugh Johnston and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A positive approach to the care of teeth, noting the functions of the different kinds of teeth and the role of nutrition in keeping teeth healthy. Stresses the need for regular dental care and visits to the dentist.
creator_credit_for_label: Suzanne Johnston, Hugh Johnston and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
